Trapper Drone.name: Trapper Drone
Trapper Drone.description: Remotely deploy AND collect traps to and from any discovered critter location! Collect-all is based on Hunter's Eagle Eye Talent.

Automation Arm.name: Automation Arm
Automation Arm.description: Automate some of the more tedious actions with the flip of a switch! Let the robots do the dirty work!
Automation Arm.bonus: +{ Automated System, controlled via @ the Robotic Arm.

description: Poisons enemies. @ Has slow speed, and deals big damage over time.
